title: Cant join games
body:
When ever i start up a game or anything it just goes black screen and  can't do anything ;( can someone please help me. 
the launcher and every thing is fine it is just a black screen when i join a game 

i use mac

replies.body:
Black screens in the Mac client are largely caused by certain network configurations that cause a poor connection to our servers. The best course of action, in my opinion, is to work through our [Mac connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#section-mac), as it contains steps that should resolve this.

Let me know if you have any further issues with this.
